l:dependency.name: BlazeMeter plugin
l:dependency.l:description: This is a plugin which allows a developer to run a set of performance tests against the BlazeMeter Cluster

l:dependency.name: Apache Commons Lang
l:dependency.l:description: Apache Commons Lang, a package of Java utility classes for the classes that are in java.lang's hierarchy, or are considered to be so standard as to justify existence in java.lang.

l:dependency.name: Okio
l:dependency.l:description: A modern I/O API for Java

l:dependency.name: OkHttp Logging Interceptor
l:dependency.l:description: An HTTP+HTTP/2 client for Android and Java applications

l:dependency.name: Commons IO
l:dependency.l:description: The Commons IO library contains utility classes, stream implementations, file filters, file comparators, endian transformation classes, and much more.

l:dependency.name: Hamcrest Core
l:dependency.l:description: This is the core API of hamcrest matcher framework to be used by third-party framework providers. This includes the a foundation set of matcher implementations for common operations.

l:dependency.name: json-lib
l:dependency.l:description: Java library for transforming beans, maps, collections, java arrays and XML to JSON.

l:dependency.name: JUnit
l:dependency.l:description: JUnit is a unit testing framework for Java, created by Erich Gamma and Kent Beck.

l:dependency.name: ezmorph
l:dependency.l:description: Simple java library for transforming an Object to another Object.

l:dependency.name: OkHttp
l:dependency.l:description: An HTTP+HTTP/2 client for Android and Java applications
